name: Tree View for Trello
details:
Displays Trello lists and cards in a tree view for easier visualization.
Features:
  • TreeView style to view cards and lists
  • Great overview of cards and lists without too much detail
  • Collapse/Expand lists without archiving
  • Keyboard shortcuts (See below)
  • *Reorder cards while in tree view
Needs authorization.
Go to PowerUp > Click Gear Icon > Authorize
Keyboard shortcuts:
  • Arrow Left = Collapse
  • Arrow Right = Expand
  • Arrow Up = Select current node up
  • Arrow Down = Select current node down
  • Enter / Return = Open current node's link (only if it's a card)
  • Escape / ESC = Closes TreeView for Trello
author: Jobo Danque
